name: Dot flip
description:
Move your mouse around the screen and collect the squares that match your own.

Grow larger as you collect matching squares, die instantly if you touch a non-matching square.

Click your mouse to flip your ship between the 2 modes.

Note for users with high refresh rates: Sorry... I didn't think about the FPS cap until the end... and my wife is like "ok, enough computer stuff dude."
